授業の概要・背景: Each week, students will be given a topic to discuss. The students will use pictures, photographs, drawings, and words to explain that topic in a scrapbook. Students will look at each others scrapbook and ask each other questions about the scrapbook. After a while, the students will change to a new partner and repeat the process. The repeating of the discussion allows low-level students to recycle new language and grow in confidence.
授業方法: Mostly student pair workSome group discussionsSome teacher-led instruction
